medical_history.chief_complaint: Giant aneurysm detected on a CT scan during workup for headache and a facial hemangioma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a right forehead hemangioma since birth, which did not regress. Symptoms related to headaches were not specified in detail.
medical_history.family_history: Family history includes a paternal aunt with lethal subarachnoid hemorrhage and a paternal uncle with a treated unruptured aneurysm.
